com.db.chart.tooltip

Class Tooltip

  • java.lang.Object
    • RelativeLayout
      • com.db.chart.tooltip.Tooltip

  • public class Tooltip
extends RelativeLayout
    Class representing chart's tooltips. It works basically as a wrapper.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public void prepare(Rect rect,
                    float value)
        Method called by ChartView before displaying the tooltip in order to set its layout parameters.
        Parameters:
        rect - Rect covering the are of the clicked ChartEntry.
        value - Value of the entry.

      • correctPosition

        public void correctPosition(int left,
                            int top,
                            int right,
                            int bottom)
        Corrects the position of a tooltip and forces it to be within ChartView.
        Parameters:
        left - left coordinate of ChartView
        top - top coordinate of ChartView
        right - right coordinate of ChartView
        bottom - bottom coordinate of ChartView

      • animateEnter

        public void animateEnter()
        Starts enter animation.

      • animateExit

        public void animateExit(java.lang.Runnable endAction)
        Start exit animation.
        Parameters:
        endAction - Action to be executed at the end of the animation.

      • hasEnterAnimation

        public boolean hasEnterAnimation()
        Check if enter animation of type ObjectAnimator exists.
        Returns:
        true if Tooltip has enter animation defined.

      • hasExitAnimation

        public boolean hasExitAnimation()
        Check if exit animation of type ObjectAnimator exists.
        Returns:
        true if Tooltip has exit animation define.

      • on

        public boolean on()
        Maintain information about whether the tooltip is being displayed or not.
        Returns:
        true if Tooltip is currently displayed.

      • setHorizontalAlignment

        public Tooltip setHorizontalAlignment(Tooltip.Alignment alignment)
        Define the horizontal alignment of tooltip wrt entry's position. Ex. Alignment.LEFT_RIGHT means that the left side of the tooltip will be aligned with the right side of the entry.
        Parameters:
        alignment - horizontal alignment wrt entry's position.
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.

      • setVerticalAlignment

        public Tooltip setVerticalAlignment(Tooltip.Alignment alignment)
        Define the vertical alignment of tooltip wrt entry's position. Ex. Alignment.TOP_TOP means that the top side of the tooltip will be aligned with the top side of the entry.
        Parameters:
        alignment - vertical alignment wrt entry's position.
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.

      • setDimensions

        public Tooltip setDimensions(int width,
                             int height)
        Set the dimensions of the tooltip.
        Parameters:
        width - width dimension
        height - height dimension
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.

      • setMargins

        public Tooltip setMargins(int left,
                          int top,
                          int right,
                          int bottom)
        Set the margins of the tooltip wrt entry.
        Parameters:
        left - left margin dimension.
        top - top margin dimension.
        right - right margin dimension.
        bottom - bottom margin dimension.
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.

      • setOn

        public void setOn(boolean on)
        If the tooltip is being displayed.
        Parameters:
        on - True if displayed, False if not.

      • setValueFormat

        public Tooltip setValueFormat(java.text.DecimalFormat format)
        Set the format to be applied to tooltip's value.
        Parameters:
        format - value format to be used once the tooltip is displayed.
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.

      • setEnterAnimation

        public ObjectAnimator setEnterAnimation(PropertyValuesHolder... values)
        Parameters:
        values - Property values to use in animation
        Returns:
        ObjectAnimator responsible to handle animation

      • setExitAnimation

        public ObjectAnimator setExitAnimation(PropertyValuesHolder... values)
        Parameters:
        values - Property values to use in animation
        Returns:
        ObjectAnimator responsible to handle animation
